<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>package_private</access><active>true</active><api_name>x_1383151_bkquest.AuthorBookCounter</api_name><caller_access/><client_callable>false</client_callable><description/><name>AuthorBookCounter</name><script><![CDATA[var AuthorBookCounter = Class.create();
AuthorBookCounter.prototype = {
    initialize: function() {},

    countBooksPerAuthor: function() {
        // Object to hold the count of books per author
        var authorBookCount = {};

        // GlideRecord to query the Book Definition table
        var bookGR = new GlideRecord('x_1383151_bkquest_book');
        bookGR.addQuery('author', '!=', ''); // Ensure author is not empty
        bookGR.query();

        // Count the number of books for each author
        while (bookGR.next()) {
            var author = bookGR.author.toString();
            if (authorBookCount[author]) {
                authorBookCount[author]++;
            } else {
                authorBookCount[author] = 1;
            }
        }

        // GlideRecord to update the Author table
        var authorGR = new GlideRecord('x_1383151_bkquest_author');

        // Loop through the counted authors and update their book count
        for (var authorId in authorBookCount) {
            if (authorGR.get(authorId)) {
                authorGR.books_written = authorBookCount[authorId];
                authorGR.update();
            }
        }
    },

    type: 'AuthorBookCounter'
};]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>harini.srija</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2024-06-17 04:21:16</sys_created_on><sys_id>d742295693320210ef267c5efaba107c</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>AuthorBookCounter</sys_name><sys_package display_value="BookQuest" source="x_1383151_bkquest">327b26db93250210ef267c5efaba100f</sys_package><sys_policy>read</sys_policy><sys_scope display_value="BookQuest">327b26db93250210ef267c5efaba100f</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_d742295693320210ef267c5efaba107c</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>harini.srija</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-06-17 04:21:16</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>
